ygData.subject: Re: Lost in High Hold
ygData.msgSnippet: i have the answer to your question, see, you were in highhold, but not in the castle, you need to find the castle. you will know you found it, cause its
ygData.messageBody:
i have the answer to your question, see, you were in highhold, but not in
the castle, you need to find the castle. you will know you found it, cause
its another zone. once inside, go through the little courtyard, into the
castle, then go straight, and go around a wall, on the otherside of the
wall, take a right, into a little room with a door in it, open the door, and
the guy is in there. Enjoy!

-Aeramus

----- Original Message -----
From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 06, 1999 8:21 PM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Lost in High Hold


> From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
>
> it's ust hard to get into highkeep. once there its cake. just walk around
> and go to every room. there is one room with a door and a gaurd next to
it,
> they are in there.
>
> Qorona of the Volition Guild, 16th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
>
> At 04:47 PM 5/6/99 -0500, you wrote:
> >From: Michael O'Reilly <michael@...>
> >
> >I found the guy once, to buy the 8th level animation spell. It's very
> >dangerous there, but not impossible. Invisibility is the key, as you
> >probably know since you were in the keep. The merchant is an Erudite,
> >and he's up on the second floor of the keep. I can't give specific
> >directions, as I was just running around until I found him, then gated
> >out immediately after I memorized the spell. I don't remember his name,
> >either, but he was the only Erudite I recall seeing there.
> >
> >Good luck.
> >
> >
> -------------------
> tim borrelli
> computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire
